item.title: Using hugo + github pages to build personal blog
item.description: I have always want to have a personal website to show my personal CV and to record the technical documentations. Recently, hugo has been shown up. After one day of trying, a personal website has been built. The detailed steps are listed below. Tools Hugo. To build the website locally. Github. To publish the website. SourceTree. To synchornize the local website to Github. Plantform Windows 11 Steps Installing Hugo Opt.1. Download hugo singal .
